mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (select Q3.ZJ_ABBR_NAME Zj_Name,nvl(Q2.bb_Amt,0)bb_Amt,Q3.ZJ_KD_NEW bb_Amt_Avg_Tar from (select case when p1.ZJ is null then Q1.ZJ_OLD else p1.ZJ end Zj_Name ,count(*) as bb_Amt from (select s.*,D.ZJ_OLD from XFY_RPT_KD_ORDER_DETAIL s left join XFY_REP_PUB_ZJ_CON D on D.Zj_New = S.ZJ_AREA_NAME where s.cpl_dt >= #{startDate} and s.cpl_dt <= #{endDate} ) Q1 left join XFY_REP_PUB_CDRY P1 ON Q1.MKT_EMPLOYEE_ID=P1.MKT_NAME group by case when p1.ZJ is null then Q1.ZJ_OLD else p1.ZJ end)Q2 right join XFY_REP_PUB_TARGET Q3 on Q3.ZJ_ABBR_NAME=Q2.Zj_Name WHERE Q3.ZJ_ABBR_NAME NOT IN ('鄞州政企部','合计') order by q3.ZJ_ABBR_NAME desc)Q4 UNION ALL select Zj_Name,bb_Amt,Q3.ZJ_KD_NEW from (select '合计' Zj_Name,nvl(count(*),0) bb_Amt from XFY_RPT_KD_ORDER_DETAIL s where s.cpl_dt >= #{startDate} and s.cpl_dt <= #{endDate} ) Q2 left join XFY_REP_PUB_TARGET Q3 on Q3.ZJ_ABBR_NAME=Q2.Zj_Name

SELECT * FROM (select p3.Zj_Name,AMT_NOW-AMT_OLD bb_Amt_Jz ,Q3.ZJ_KD_JZ bb_Amt_Avg_Tar_Jz from (select p1.Zj_Name,AMT_NOW,AMT_OLD,AMT_NOW-AMT_OLD from (select D.ZJ_OLD as Zj_Name,COUNT(*) AMT_NOW from XFY_KD_ASSET S2 left join XFY_REP_PUB_ZJ_CON D on D.Zj_New = S2.ZJ_AREA_NAME GROUP BY D.ZJ_OLD )p1 left join (select D.ZJ_OLD as Zj_Name,COUNT(*) AMT_OLD from ${tableName} S1 left join XFY_REP_PUB_ZJ_CON D on D.Zj_New = S1.ZJ_AREA_NAME GROUP BY D.ZJ_OLD) p2 on p1.Zj_Name=p2.Zj_Name)p3 right join XFY_REP_PUB_TARGET Q3 on Q3.ZJ_ABBR_NAME=p3.Zj_Name WHERE Q3.ZJ_ABBR_NAME NOT IN ('鄞州政企部','合计') order by p3.Zj_Name desc) union all select Q6.*,Q7.ZJ_KD_JZ bb_Amt_Avg_Tar_Jz from (SELECT '合计' Zj_Name,Q4.AMT_NOW-Q5.AMT_OLD bb_Amt_Jz from (select COUNT(*)AMT_NOW FROM XFY_KD_ASSET) Q4,(select COUNT(*)AMT_OLD FROM ${tableName})Q5) Q6 left join XFY_REP_PUB_TARGET Q7 on Q6.Zj_Name=Q7.ZJ_ABBR_NAME

select q1.ZJ_AREA_NAME Zj_Name,q1.DATA_USER_NAME,q1.CDSC_NAME,q1.STAT_NAME,q1.ASSET_ROW_ID,q1.CACCT_ID,q1.BIL_FLG,q1.DATE_CD as bilTime from ${tableName} q1 left join XFY_KD_ASSET q2 on q1.ASSET_ROW_ID=q2.ASSET_ROW_ID where q2.ASSET_ROW_ID is null and q1.ZJ_AREA_NAME in (SELECT p3.ZJ_NEW FROM XFY_REP_PUB_ZJ_CON P3 WHERE P3.ZJ_OLD = #{zjName})

SELECT * FROM (select p3.Zj_Name,AMT_NOW-AMT_OLD bb_Amt_Jz ,Q3.ZJ_KD_JZ bb_Amt_Avg_Tar_Jz from (select p1.Zj_Name,AMT_NOW,AMT_OLD,AMT_NOW-AMT_OLD from ( select D.ZJ_OLD as Zj_Name,COUNT(*) AMT_NOW from ${tableNameNew} S2 left join XFY_REP_PUB_ZJ_CON D on D.Zj_New = S2.ZJ_AREA_NAME GROUP BY D.ZJ_OLD )p1 left join (select D.ZJ_OLD as Zj_Name,COUNT(*) AMT_OLD from ${tableNameOld} S1 left join XFY_REP_PUB_ZJ_CON D on D.Zj_New = S1.ZJ_AREA_NAME_NEW GROUP BY D.ZJ_OLD) p2 on p1.Zj_Name=p2.Zj_Name)p3 right join XFY_REP_PUB_TARGET Q3 on Q3.ZJ_ABBR_NAME=p3.Zj_Name WHERE Q3.ZJ_ABBR_NAME NOT IN ('鄞州政企部','合计') order by p3.Zj_Name desc) union all select Q6.*,Q7.ZJ_KD_JZ bb_Amt_Avg_Tar_Jz from (SELECT '合计' Zj_Name,Q4.AMT_NOW-Q5.AMT_OLD bb_Amt_Jz from (select COUNT(*)AMT_NOW FROM ${tableNameNew}) Q4,(select COUNT(*)AMT_OLD FROM ${tableNameOld})Q5) Q6 left join XFY_REP_PUB_TARGET Q7 on Q6.Zj_Name=Q7.ZJ_ABBR_NAME

select p3.Zj_Name,AMT_NOW,AMT_OLD,AMT_NOW-AMT_OLD bb_Amt_Jz ,Q3.ZJ_KD_JZ bb_Amt_Avg_Tar_Jz from (select p1.Zj_Name,AMT_NOW,AMT_OLD,AMT_NOW-AMT_OLD from (select D.ZJ_OLD as Zj_Name,COUNT(*) AMT_NOW from XFY_RPT_ZLYW_ACT_ASSET S2 left join XFY_REP_PUB_ZJ_CON D on D.Zj_New = S2.ZJ_AREA_NAME where S2.BIL_FLG='1' and s2.TYPE='KD' and s2.ACT_FLG='1' GROUP BY D.ZJ_OLD )p1 left join (select D.ZJ_OLD Zj_Name,count(*) AMT_OLD from (select l.ZJ_AREA_NAME_NEW ,s1.* from XFY_RPT_ZLYW_ACT_ASSET202112 S1 left join XFY_KD_ASSET_BAK_BEF202112 l on l.ASSET_ROW_ID=s1.ASSET_ROW_ID where s1.BIL_FLG='1' and s1.TYPE='KD' and s1.ACT_FLG='1' ) p5 left join XFY_REP_PUB_ZJ_CON D on D.Zj_New = p5.ZJ_AREA_NAME_NEW group by D.ZJ_OLD )p2 on p1.Zj_Name=p2.Zj_Name)p3 right join XFY_REP_PUB_TARGET Q3 on Q3.ZJ_ABBR_NAME=p3.Zj_Name WHERE Q3.ZJ_ABBR_NAME NOT IN ('鄞州政企部','合计') order by p3.Zj_Name desc;

SELECT S1.ZJ_AREA_NAME Zj_Name,S1.DATE_CD,S1.ASSET_ROW_ID,S1.ACCS_NBR,S1.DATA_USER_NAME,S1.PROM_NAME,S1.PROM_AMT, S1.SERV_START_DT,S1.STAT_NAME,S1.XZ_FLG,S1.ACT_FLG,S1.TYPE,S1.ACT_DAYS,S1.CCUST_ID,S1.MKT_EMPLOYEE_ID, S1.MKT_EMPLOYEE_NAME,S1.MIX_COMB_NBR_FLG,s1.BIL_FLG,s1.WG_ID,S1.WG_NAME FROM ${tableName} S1 left join XFY_RPT_ZLYW_ACT_ASSET S2 on s1.ASSET_ROW_ID= S2.ASSET_ROW_ID and s2.act_flg='1' and s2.TYPE='KD' and s2.BIL_FLG='1' where s1.act_flg='1' and s1.TYPE='KD' and s1.BIL_FLG='1' and s2.ASSET_ROW_ID is null

select Q9.ZJ_OLD ZJ_NAME,Q1.GIS_ID,Q1.YXWGMC,nvl(Q2.nowNum,0) nowNum,nvl(Q3.lastNum,0) lastNum,nvl(Q2.nowNum-Q3.lastNum,0) AS jzNum from XFY_KD_WG Q1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT s2.WG_ID,COUNT(*) nowNum FROM XFY_KD_ASSET S2 where s2.WG_ID is not null GROUP BY s2.WG_ID ) Q2 ON Q1.GIS_ID= Q2.WG_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT s3.WG_ID,COUNT(*) lastNum FROM ${tableName} S3 where s3.WG_ID is not null GROUP BY s3.WG_ID ) Q3 on Q1.GIS_ID= Q3.WG_ID left join XFY_REP_PUB_ZJ_CON Q9 on Q9.ZJ_NEW=Q1.ZJ_NAME WHERE Q1.GIS_ID IS NOT NULL Order by jzNum

select * from (select Q4.ZJ_NAME,count(*) GIS_NUM ,SUM(CASE WHEN jzNum < 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) FJZ_NUM,SUM(CASE WHEN jzNum<0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(*) FJZ_RATE from ( select Q9.ZJ_OLD ZJ_NAME ,Q1.GIS_ID,Q1.YXWGMC,nvl(Q2.nowNum,0) nowNum,nvl(Q3.lastNum,0) lastNum,nvl(Q2.nowNum-Q3.lastNum,0) AS jzNum from XFY_KD_WG Q1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT s2.WG_ID,COUNT(*) nowNum FROM XFY_KD_ASSET S2 where s2.WG_ID is not null GROUP BY s2.WG_ID ) Q2 ON Q1.GIS_ID= Q2.WG_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT s3.WG_ID,COUNT(*) lastNum FROM ${tableName} S3 where s3.WG_ID is not null GROUP BY s3.WG_ID ) Q3 on Q1.GIS_ID= Q3.WG_ID left join XFY_REP_PUB_ZJ_CON Q9 on Q9.ZJ_NEW=Q1.ZJ_NAME WHERE Q1.GIS_ID IS NOT NULL Order by Q1.ZJ_NAME )Q4 group by Q4.ZJ_NAME order by Q4.ZJ_NAME) Q5 union all select '合计' as ZJ_NAME, count(*) GIS_NUM ,SUM(CASE WHEN jzNum<0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) FJZ_NUM ,SUM(CASE WHEN jzNum<0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(*) FJZ_RATE from ( select Q1.GIS_ID,nvl(Q2.nowNum,0) nowNum,nvl(Q3.lastNum,0) lastNum,nvl(Q2.nowNum-Q3.lastNum,0) AS jzNum from XFY_KD_WG Q1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT s2.WG_ID,COUNT(*) nowNum FROM XFY_KD_ASSET S2 where s2.WG_ID is not null GROUP BY s2.WG_ID ) Q2 ON Q1.GIS_ID= Q2.WG_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT s3.WG_ID,COUNT(*) lastNum FROM ${tableName} S3 where s3.WG_ID is not null GROUP BY s3.WG_ID ) Q3 on Q1.GIS_ID= Q3.WG_ID WHERE Q1.GIS_ID IS NOT NULL )
